text:
Alessandro Criscuolo (15 July 1937 – 10 March 2020) was an Italian judge. He was President of the Constitutional Court of Italy between 12 November 2014 and 24 February 2016. He was a Judge on the Court between 2008 and 2017. He was born in Naples, Italy.
Criscuolo died on 10 March 2020 at the age of 82.

annotations.surface_form: President of the Constitutional Court of Italy
